price: 52.Nabiyow moominiiniy carraay saaku sinni Rabbih fooca edde faxak kaa taqbude kó luk daffeytaamak ken maxiiriyin, Nabiyow ama tumaleela abteemih cisaabak kaamol tumatan, atu abteemih cisaabak ken amol tumatan, tokkel atu ken xiiriytek, toysa daalimiinih yan marak numuk teyna akketto.
arabic: وَلَا تَطۡرُدِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلۡعَشِيِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَهُۥۖ مَا عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ وَمَا مِنۡ حِسَابِكَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَتَطۡرُدَهُمۡ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walā taṭrudi alladhīna yadʿūna rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-ʿashiyi yurīdūna wajhahu mā ʿalayka min ḥisābihim min shayin wamā min ḥisābika ʿalayhim min shayin fataṭrudahum fatakūna mina al-ẓālimīna
translations: So were you to send them away
